seed_pair.target: I'm looking forward to speaking better as soon as I can.
seed_pair.known: Estoy deseando hablar mejor tan pronto como pueda.

S0024: no voy a poder | voy a poder | poder recordar | recordar fácilmente | fácilmente
I'm not going to be able to | I'm going to be able to | to be able to remember | remember easily | easily
S0025: vas a ayudarme | antes de que tenga que ir | tenga que ir
you're going to help me | before I have to go | I have to go
S0026: me gusta sentir | sentir como si | como si estuviera | estuviera casi preparado | casi preparado | preparado para ir | para ir
I like feeling | to feel as if | as if I were | I were nearly ready | nearly ready | ready to go | to go
S0027: no me gusta | no me gusta tomar | tomar demasiado tiempo | demasiado tiempo | tiempo para responder | para responder
I don't like | I don't like taking | to take too much time | too much time | time to answer | to answer
S0028: es útil | es útil comenzar a hablar | comenzar a hablar | tan pronto como puedas | tan pronto como
it's useful | it's useful to start talking | to start talking | as soon as you can | as soon as
